page.description: Set active email profile. The EMAIL_SET_ACTIVE() function sets Profile_Name to be the active profile.

argument.name: profile
argument.description: The name of an email profile.

page.example: ? email_set_active("AT&T Broadband") = .T. ? email_get_active() = "AT&T Broadband" ? email_set_active("Nonexistent Profile") = .F. ? email_get_active() = "AT&T Broadband"
